colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @040A *, ,(CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA NAS 'BYUNG BA'I NYAMS LEN GYI SGO RNAM PAR NGES PA LEGS GSUNGS KUN GYI SNYING KHU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SGOM CHEN NGAG GI DBANG PO GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I SDE ZHES BYA BAS, ZE GDONG DKAR PO NYI SHAR DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS LA DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,^ MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA'I GSUNG 'BUM GRAS NAS, BYIN RLABS NYE BRGYUD LA PHYAG 'TSAL BA'I RIM PA DANG, BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA NAS 'BYUNG BA'I NYAMS LEN GYI SGO RNAM PAR NGES PA LEGS GSUNGS KUN GYI NYING KHU, DRI BA LHAG BSAM RAB DKAR GYI DRI LAN DNGOS GRUB PHRENG BA MKHAS PA'I RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI GSUM, RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO'I BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA'I DON DU, DVAGS GRVA ZHAL SNGA NAS SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE LHUN GRUB RGYA MTSOS LHAG BSAM RNAM DAG GIS, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO LHA RGYA RI BAR PAR GYI BSKUL MA MDZAD PAR MCHOD YON DAM TSIG GTZANG BAR MA ZAD, DPON BLON GNYIS KA BSTAN PA'I ZHABS 'DEGS LA SNYING STOBS CHE BA BCAS 'PHRAL DU ZHAL BZHES GNANG BAR BRTEN, LAM RIM TSIGS BCAD MA 'DI LA RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I LAM RIM CHUNG DU DANG MTHUN PA'I SA BCAD ZHIG CIS KYANG BGYIS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKRAL BAR MA ZAD BLO DMAN BDAG LTA BU LA'ANG PHAN NAM SNYAM PA'I BSAM PAS KUN NAS BLANGS TE, ZHABS 'DEGS KYI TSUL DU, LAM RIM CHUNG NGU'I SA BCAD LTAR LA, SNOD KYI SKYON GSUM SPONG BA DANG, 'DU SHES DRUG BSTEN PA SOGS KYIS MTSON PA'I GO RIM CUNG ZAD LAM RIM DANG MI MTHUN PA MKHAN CHEN RANG NYID KYI GSUNG GZHIR BZHAG STE, @040B GRANGS 'DREN GYI AANG RTAGS DANG BCAS PA GYI NA PA DON DBANG GIS SUG BRIS SU BTAB PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR RJE 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RGYAS SHING, BYE BRAG TU YANG LAM 'DI LA THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM BGYID PA RNAMS KYI RGYAN DU 'GYUR BA DANG; 'DI YI CHED DU SGO GSUM YI 'BAD PA BGYIS PA'I RANG GZHAN THAMS CAD KYANG LAM BZANG 'DI NYID LA SGURB PA SNYING POR BYAS TE MA GYUR LUS CAN KUN GYI NGAN DU ZUNG 'JUG RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,) *, ,RGYAL GSUNG MDO SNGAGS LAM GYI SNYING PO'I BCUD, ,JI BZHIN GSAL BYED LEGS GSUNG NYING KHU 'DI, ,DAD DANG MOS PA LHAG BSAM RNAM DAG PAS, ,SKYE RGU'I BDAG MO DANG MTSUNGS RGYU SBYOR BA, ,RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG SGROL MA ZHES BYA BAS, ,PAR DU LEGS BSKRUN RNAM DKAR PHUNG PO'I MTHUS, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN DAR BSTAN 'DZIN SKU TSE 'PHEL, ,MA GYUR 'GRO KUN GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUGS, ,RE BA'I 'BRAS BU MYUR DU 'GRUB PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR RGYU SBYOR LTOS BCAS SKYE KUN TU, ,DAL 'BYOR RTEN THOB DGE BA'I BSHES DANG MJAL, ,TSANG LA MA NOR LAM BZANG 'DI NYID LA, ,RTZE GCIG BRTZON PAS 'BAD LAS THAMS CAD MKHYEN, ,STOBS BCU MNGA' BA'I GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG ,(CES DVAGS PO NGAG DBANG GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I LAM RIM TSIGS BCAD MA DANG, NGOS KYI DAG RTZOM RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSKYED RDZOGS, SDOM GSUM BSLAB BYA SOGS PAR GSAR @041A *, ,BSKRUN RJE BTZUN DRUNG NAS MDZAD SKABS SMON TSIG TU RVA SGRENG AA CHI THU NO MON HAN DU 'BOD PAS SBYAR,, ,,)
